Description.Name: Phoenix Hawk
Description.Details: The Kurita-modified PXH-1K removes almost of its jump capability in favor of better armor and heat management. This makes it less flexible in more restrictive environments, but it's still a nimble and reliable skirmisher.

YangsThoughts: The Kurita-modified PXH-1K removes all of its jump capability in favor of better armor and heat management. This makes it less flexible in more restrictive environments, but it's still a nimble and reliable skirmisher.
